mapper.select: select count(*) from Member where email=#{email}
select email from Member where name=#{name}
select m.name from team_member g join member m on m.id=g.member_id where group_id=#{groupId}
select m.member_id from team_member g join member m on m.id=g.member_id where group_id=#{groupId}
select groupname from team where group_id=1
select t.member_id from candidate c join team_member as t on c.team_id=t.team_id where c.candidate_id=#{candidateId}
select t.teamname, c.startAt as startAt, c.endAt as endAt from candidate as c join team as t on c.team_id=t.team_id where c.candidate_id=#{candidateId}
SELECT t.team_id as groupId, t.teamname as groupName FROM Team t JOIN Team_Member tm ON t.team_id = tm.team_id WHERE tm.member_id = #{memberId};
mapper.delete: delete from Team_Member where team_id=#{groupId} and member_id=#{memberId}
delete from Team where team_id=#{groupId} CASCADE
